definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: Pharaoh, Faraw, title of Egyptain kings (Egypt. pr-‘o, great house, of royal court, and (in new kingdom) of king Griffith:Hastings DB Mey:Gesch. Alt. i. 59 Steind:BAS. i. 343; in As pir’u acc. to most, cf. COT:Gloss. Steind:i.c., but v. Wkl:MVAG. 1898. 3f.);—´[[פ]] Ge 12:15, Ge 12:15, Ge 12:15, Ge 12:17 + 212 t. Hex 19 t. K, Is 19:11, Is 19:11 + 3 t., Je Je 25:19 + 10 t., Ez Eze 17:17 + 12 t., Ne 9:10, 1Ch 4:18, 2Ch 8:11, Ps 135:9, Ps 136:15, Ct So 1:9; + [[מֶלֶךְ מִחְרַיִם]] (not early) Je 25:19, Je 46:17, De 7:8, De 11:3, Ez Eze 29:2, Eze 29:3, Eze 30:21, Eze 30:22, Eze 31:2, 1Ki 3:1, 1Ki 9:16, 1Ki 11:18, 2Ki 17:7, 2Ki 18:21 = Is 36:6, Ge 41:46 (E), Ex 6:11, Ex 6:13, Ex 6:27, Ex 6:29, Ex 14:8 (all P); c.n.pr. [[חָפְרַע]] ´[[פ]] Je 44:30, [[נְכׂה]] ´[[פ]] 46:2, 2Ki 23:29, 2Ki 23:33, 2Ki 23:34, 2Ki 23:35.
